```js
<Fluid>
  <FluidItem>Left</FluidItem>
  <FluidItem>Center</FluidItem>
  <FluidItem>Right</FluidItem>
</Fluid>
```

```js
<Fluid>
  <FluidItem>Left</FluidItem>
  <FluidItem fill>Center</FluidItem>
  <FluidItem>Right</FluidItem>
</Fluid>
```

```js
<Fluid halign="left">
  <FluidItem>Left</FluidItem>
  <FluidItem>Center</FluidItem>
  <FluidItem>Right</FluidItem>
</Fluid>
```

```js
<Fluid halign="left" valign="middle">
  <FluidItem>Short</FluidItem>
  <FluidItem>
    T<br />a<br />l<br />l
  </FluidItem>
  <FluidItem>
    Anot<br />her
  </FluidItem>
</Fluid>
```

```js
<Fluid halign="center" valign="middle" style={{ height: "100px" }}>
  <FluidItem>Centerpiece</FluidItem>
</Fluid>
```
